title: Linux Pocket Guide Second Edition
description:
Linux Pocket Guide, 2nd Edition


Publication Date: March 27, 2012 | ISBN-10: 1449316697 | ISBN-13: 978-1449316693 | Edition: Second Edition
Publisher: O'Reilly

If you use Linux in your day-to-day work, this popular pocket guide is the perfect on-the-job reference. The second edition has expanded from Fedora-only coverage to distro-neutral, with practical information on a wider range of commands requested by readers.

Linux Pocket Guide provides an organized learning path for Linux use, rather than Linux programming and system administration. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find options for the most useful commands, grouped by functionality. For novices who need to get up to speed on Linux use, and experienced users who want a concise and functional reference, this guide provides quick answers.
